text: Alinea is a genus of skinks. ==Species== The following 2 species, listed alphabetically by specific name, are recognized as being valid: *Alinea lanceolata (Cope, 1862) – Barbados skink *Alinea luciae (Garman, 1887) – Saint Lucia skink(extinct) Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Alinea. ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Alinea (skink) Category:Taxa named by Stephen Blair Hedges Category:Taxa named by Caitlin E. Conn
title: Alinea (skink)
